task.title: Create Publications and Deliverables in Oxygen
task.shortdesc: In this step, you create Publications and Deliverables necessary to connect the Oxygen files to an external connector, in this case, Netlify.

step.cmd: In the upper left, click on the title of your project to leave your Personal workspace.
Create a new Publication for your project

substep.cmd: Click Publications on the left side of the page
Select the blue New Publications button on the upper right side of the page
Name your publication something relevant to your project
Select DITA Map Path, then selection ditamap.ditamap
Select the blue "Create" button at the bottom of the window
